alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; Lincoln; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 2:40PM EST until January 03 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, south winds 5 to 15 knots with gusts up to 30 knots. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 35 knots expected across area lakes, and speeds of 20 to 25 mph with gusts of 35 to 45 mph expected across land surfaces. * WHERE...Portions of central South Carolina and east central Georgia. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 3 AM EST Monday. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 AM to 11 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
